result.execSummary:
The defendant Andrew R Stephens was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take >$500 - $5000), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Notice of Case Status Change - Revoked - Sentenced to Prison
Dated 04/10/15, from DOC, confirming cancelation of detainer.
Transcript received and filed for the following date and event: 03/16/15 plea/sentencing hearing.
Civil Judgment for Restitution and Surcharges only. Court Costs still due as DOC collect.
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Andrew R Stephens in court, in custody, with Attorney J Anthony Rosario.   Melissa Zilavy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count #1.  Court performs plea colloquy and finds Defendant guilty of Count #1.  Repeater enhancer is striken.  State gives sentencing recommendations.  Attorney Rosario makes statements regarding sentencing.  Defendant makes statements.  Court sentences the Defendant to the following:

COUNT #1:  IMPOSED SENTENCE OF:   

9 MONTHS JAIL (CREDIT - _ days)         **CONSECUTIVE**

____DNA sample to be provided if not yet previously done 

RESTITUTION:  $699.98 to Target (to be converted to civil judgment)
                         $700.00 to Target on Case #14CF1433 (to be converted to civil judgment) 

COSTS:  $278.00 & $250.00 DNA surcharge (to be paid as a condition of probation - Waukesha Case #13CM948)
